PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07842015-06-10,  ,  ,  AAFC,  GRAIN COMM, 
ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) update the Regulation to reference the latest version of the Sampling Systems Handbook and Approval Guide; and (2) correct a discrepancy between the French and English text following a recommendation made by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0137 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
